item.title: SERVICE-minimal

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#f2f2f2" row_padding_top="200" row_padding_bottom="80"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="50"]Service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#f2f2f2"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="100"]

Imagination is the key to success, but without good assets, there won't be any business to imagine it. For an online business a great website with great customer experience is crucial.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="150"]Vitrine benefits from a creative and unique design, in addition to this, customer support makes Vitrine the best WordPress theme for those who care about their online business, Try it and you'll get endless possibilities.   Take your shop to a whole new level.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="true" gap="zero" type="full_width" background_color="#f2f2f2" row_margin_top="100"][vc_column][image_carousel gutter="no" nav_style="light" images="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" hover_color="custom" custom_hover_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.01)"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#f2f2f2" row_margin_top="120"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="50"]CREATIVE. STUNNING. MODERN.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#f2f2f2" row_margin_top="80"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][iconbox_left title="Improved WooCommerce" title_color="#222222" content_text="Improvement of current WooCommerce plugins plus adding unique features that you would rarely find in other WordPress Themes." content_color="#686868" icon="cog" icon_color="#4753ff" icon_animation="fade-in-bottom" icon_animation_delay="50"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][iconbox_left title="Reliable Support" title_color="#222222" content_text="We guarantee a flawless support service in which you may receive small customization as well as bug fix in the shortest possible time." content_color="#686868" icon="headset" icon_color="#4753ff" icon_animation="fade-in-bottom" icon_animation_delay="100"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#f2f2f2" row_margin_top="80"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][iconbox_left title="Fully Ajaxified" title_color="#222222" content_text="The theme is one of the few themes that are fully Ajaxifed, you may also disable Ajax by a simple click through out the Vitrine." content_color="#686868" icon="rocket" icon_color="#4753ff" icon_animation="fade-in-bottom" icon_animation_delay="150"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][iconbox_left title="Easy Customization" title_color="#222222" content_text="Simple customization procedure make anyone, even those who has no programming knowledge, capable of theme customization." content_color="#686868" icon="pen2" icon_color="#4753ff" icon_animation="fade-in-bottom" icon_animation_delay="200"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="true" type="full_width" background_color="#f2f2f2" row_margin_top="80"][vc_column][animatedtext title=" MINIMAL. item.title: About Us - simple
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#f8f8f8" row_padding_top="200"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][textbox title="WE'RE A CREATIVE AGENCY" title_color="#333333" title_fontsize="32" text_title_border="bottom_border" text_border_underline_color="#333333" text_under_align="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width" background_color="#f8f8f8" row_margin_top="50"][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs active_section="3"][vc_tta_section title="Responsive Design" tab_id="1459580574113-cdf8996a-361e"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

With the rapid rise of smartphone and tablet usage, responsive designs have evolved into an absolute necessity for eCommerce businesses, playing a critical role in the success of large and small brands alike. So your website needs to utilizes a mobile-friendly responsive design.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Home Page Design" tab_id="1459580574306-1410cffb-ac95"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

In the world of eCommerce, you have less than 7 seconds to create a strong first impression, and in order to do that, the design and layout of your homepage needs to be nothing short of stunning. Pull in more customers and improve conversions with an exquisite home page design.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Product Page" tab_id="1459580577843-318ed247-0a63"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Excellent product pages feature simple, aesthetically pleasing designs that help convert visitors into buyers. Your product pages are the backbone of your online store, and as such, serve a vital role in assuring and motivating customers that your product is what they need.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width" background_color="#f8f8f8" row_margin_top="50"][vc_column][image_carousel visible_items="6" gutter="no" nav_style="light" images="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" hover_color="custom" custom_hover_color="#4664ea" zoom="yes" style="light"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="true" background_color="#4664ea" row_padding_top="40" row_padding_bottom="40"][vc_column width="1/2" vertical_position="middle"][textbox title="Simply, we are the best! " title_color="#ffffff" title_fontsize="32" subtitle_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" vertical_position="middle"][button button_hover_style="style2" text="BUY NOW!" url="#" size="standard" alignment="right" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_text_hover_color="#3c3c3c" button_bg_border_color="#ffffff" button_border_radius="20px" button_border_width="2px" I was not that bright and I was not that talented, not many friends and a very normal elementary school, puberty changed them all I started to get noticed. and...

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Guys I have to say that this theme is stunning. I’ve never seen such broad features in an ecommerce theme. The loading time is actually better than any other theme and the design is creative yet simple. What is the name of it? Where can I buy it?
Dear Monica, first of all thank you for the compliments, our theme’s name is Vitrine, you can download it from ThemeForest.

I was surfing web and accidentally found your website. I was looking around and never thought that this is a mock up until I read previous comment. Your theme, Vitrine, is perfect and can simply be the best WooCommerce theme on ThemeForest even it may be the best ecommerce theme of 2016.

item.excerpt:encoded: 2016 is all about long wavy hair with a transparent color from black to grey or blond. In general light hair color is what looks fashionable. The cut is simple and includes texture to make hair look fuller. For hair styling the trend is to use a round of hair iron plus a firm touch of curling iron.

item.excerpt:encoded: If you enjoy a good sale and an on budget shopping experience wait for the end of season sale of Cloth Diva in the 5th avenue. In normal sales buying a blouse in this store may cost from 600-900 dollars while on sale the same cloth costs about 100 dollars or less.

text_content_color="#3b3b3b" text_animation="fade-in-left"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6"][textbox title="Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way." text_content="The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didn’t listen. She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarks grove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didn’t take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency" content_fontsize="14" text_animation="fade-in-right"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width"][vc_column][animatedtext title="#Made With Pride " animatedtext_style="text_only" title_back_color="#da2d2f" animatedtext_font_size="10" animatedtext_speed="16"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="true" gap="35" row_padding_top="100" row_padding_bottom="100"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][textbox title="Our Clients" title_color="#3b3b3b" title_fontsize="24" text_under_align="center" subtitle_color="#898989"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" vertical_position="middle" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][textbox text_content="Concept – Jane Gallingor Editing – Matthew Carter Production – Justin Govender" content_fontsize="16" text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="200"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][textbox text_content="Mix - Austin Morgan photography - Alex Monez executor - Monica Bastini" content_fontsize="16" text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="400"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][textbox text_content="Illustration - Sophia Kingly Material - Rosa Hamilton Marketing- Xulio Igeort" content_fontsize="16" text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="600"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Creative
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The project was ordered by Harper Bazar magazine and they wanted it to be single colored. The customer used this logo in Vitrine WordPress theme.

She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way." text_content="The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didn’t listen. She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarks grove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didn’t take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency" content_fontsize="14" text_animation="fade-in-right"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][image_carousel gutter="no" images="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID"][vc_column_text]

item.excerpt:encoded: Winter/fall shoe collections are usually related to school days and rainy cold conditions. Even though many would prefer cheap shoes for summer (due to the lack of protection needed), many look for high quality shoes that can resist weather conditions. michael kors found a solution to stun us by his designs.

item.title: H&M Classic T-shirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1466572147639{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1466572981768{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="50"][vc_column_text]

To make the best of your look you'll need to find something that describes you the best, and nothing does that as a great piece of classic clothing. Classic clothing are usually solid colored and they are decorated with beads and jewelries. Classical gowns are also glorious and chic. To make sure that our fabrics are the best we purchase them directly from manufacturers and not retailers, that's why vitrine is the best.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="90"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: If you liked this product don’t hesitate to buy it. The material is beautiful and durable, at the same time it is suitable for any occasion you might want to attend.
I bought it as a present but the packaging was not as beautiful as I requested. I still vote 4 stars because the product itself was amazing.
The most perfect shopping experience, product arrived on time, I intended to come back soon for another purchase.

item.excerpt:encoded: Vitrine products are guaranteed to benefit from the highest quality products and the most trusted brands around the globe. Our main intention is to gain our customer’s trust and make them a secure and win-win shopping experience. We may not be the best but we are trying hard to be the best.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: If you liked this product don't hesitate to buy it. The material is beautiful and durable, at the same time it is suitable for any occasion you might want to attend.
I bought it as a present but the packaging was not as beautiful as I requested. I still vote 4 stars because the product itself was amazing.
The most perfect shopping experience, product arrived on time, I intended to come back soon for another purchase.
